arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 0-5 Atalanta: Match Report
arts.sum: Italy's Mateo Retegui delivered a stunning performance, scoring four goals to lead Atalanta to a dominant 5-0 victory over Hellas Verona at the Stadio Bentegodi. This win solidifies Atalanta's hold on third place in the Serie A table. The post Serie A | Verona 0-5 Atalanta: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog: Empoli vs. Milan, Verona vs. Atalanta and Torino vs. Genoa
Serie A | Verona v Atalanta: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Atalanta head coach Gian Piero Gasperini is grappling with a significant injury crisis as his team prepares for two crucial upcoming matches. The Bergamo-based club have been dealt a severe blow with the news that Italian internationals Giorgio Scalvini and Gianluca Scamacca will be sidelined for the remainder of the season. Both players had recently made their comebacks from serious knee injuries, making their absence all the more impactful. The post Serie A | Verona v Atalanta: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Atalanta take on Verona to get back to the top
arts.sum: Hellas Verona won their last league match against Monza and could win two games in a row in Serie A for the first time since March 2024 (against Sassuolo and Lecce in that case). Atalanta have scored the most goals in the first 15 minutes of Serie A matches this season (7), while Hellas Verona have conceded the most in that time (10).

arts.ttl: Verona Manager Zanetti Addresses Team’s Situation Ahead of Atalanta Clash
arts.sum: Verona's head coach Paolo Zanetti addressed the media in a pre-match press conference ahead of their crucial Serie A clash against Atalanta at the Bentegodi stadium. The manager emphasized the importance of maintaining focus on their objectives and praised his team's unity in the face of challenges. The post Verona Manager Zanetti Addresses Team’s Situation Ahead of Atalanta Clash appeared first on FootItalia.com.
